column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Had a small cheese deep dish pizza. It's the first deep dish I've ever had and I think it might not be for me. I didn't like the crust. It was too soft in the center and the edge was too hard to eat. It was not buttery
column2: flaky and crispy like others described at all. Also
column3: I think there was too little tomato sauce. 3 stars because the cheese taste good. Overall
column4: I didn't like the ratio of crust
